example[0]: The flight has been cancelled due to mechanical failure.
example[1]: The plane had to make an emergency landing because of mechanical problems.
definition[1]: using power from an engine or machine to do a particular kind of work
definition[2]: a mechanical action, reply etc is one you do without thinking, and has been done many times before
example[4]: He was asked the same question so many times that the answer became mechanical.
definition[3]: someone who is mechanical understands how machines work
definition[4]: relating to or produced by physical forces
